title: Gangster Squad Fonts. Font Identification Help.
content:
Hello everyone. First time posting on this forum and was wondering if i could get some help. I tried doing a search but have had no luck in finding these fonts.

I was wondering if anyone knows of what both of these fonts are? Both the cursive and typeface. Or anything similar.

Sorry for the terrible pictures. It looks better zoomed out lol.

Any help will be greatly appreciated!

Thanks :)

-Kristina

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%201%20(1)_6160.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%201_5813.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%202%20(2)_6413.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%203%20(1)_3792.JPG)
author: kristinajuarbe

comments.content:
Hi Ryuk!

Thank you! It looks very similar and i like it!

Now i have to try and find the cursive font lol.

Thanks!

Any other suggestions for similar fonts would be greatly appreaciated :)

Bomparte's Fonts/CapistranoBF  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/bompartes-fonts/capistrano-bf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425/http:/www.fonts.com/font/bompartes-fonts/capistrano-bf)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/music1_5921.jpg)
This font has an extended character set but I didn't see the extended tail on the y in the sample. Everything else seems to fit.
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011190425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/music2_5299.jpg)
